pages.speaker: lass
lines: Mr. Steven Stone told me he was expecting you. This way, please.

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run effect give @s minecraft:blindness 3 1 true');

pages.speaker: lass
lines: Professor Cozmo. If I may interrupt you...

pages.speaker: profcozmo
lines: And you brought the Meteorite Shard with you. Well done!

lines.expression: q.player.username + ' handed over the Meteorite Shard to Professor Cozmo!'

pages.speaker: steven
lines: I was rather surprised to learn that you knew the professor.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: You really do seem to make connections everywhere you go.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: Now then, Professor...

pages.speaker: steven
lines: Could I ask you to explain once more about the current plan?

pages.speaker: profcozmo
lines: Indeed... Please come this way.

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run gamemode spectator');

pages.speaker: profcozmo
lines: I imagine that you've heard some of the situation from President Stone already.

pages.speaker: profcozmo
lines: Our current plan involves using the Infinity Energy within our rocket, combined with the life energy of humans found in Key Stones...

pages.speaker: profcozmo
lines: We will start off by artificially replicating the massive energy that is triggered at the time of Mega Evolution!

pages.speaker: profcozmo
lines: We will fire the energy produced from our rocket into space...

pages.speaker: profcozmo
lines: And create a "warp hole."

pages.speaker: profcozmo
lines: By creating a warp hole in the path of the incoming meteoroid, we hope to be able to transport it somewhere far away from here.

pages.speaker: profcozmo
lines: As a matter of fact, this technology already exists and has been incorporated in some of our commonly used devices.

pages.speaker: profcozmo
lines: I think you know what I mean.

pages.speaker: profcozmo
lines: Those panels that spin you about and then out you come, warped to another spot.

pages.speaker: profcozmo
lines: I imagine you've stepped on a few such?

pages.speaker: steven
lines: An audacious plan... And using such technology you would...

pages.speaker: steven
lines: May I ask where exactly the asteroid will be warped to?

pages.speaker: profcozmo
lines: Well. We're not entirely sure, but...

pages.speaker: profcozmo
lines: We do have a device that links the warp holes.

pages.speaker: profcozmo
lines: We've named it the Link Cable.

pages.speaker: profcozmo
lines: But there's no need to worry. Based on our theory, we can at least guarantee that we will be sending it away from our planet.

pages.speaker: profcozmo
lines: However, we've realized that we will need more energy than originally anticipated to control the Link Cable properly...

pages.speaker: profcozmo
lines: I'm sorry to ask this of you, but with one more Meteorite Shard...

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run function hoenn:triggers/stopsound');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run playsound theheirstoeternity record @s[tag=!RadioOff] ~ ~ ~ 1 1 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run scoreboard players set @s[tag=!RadioOff] MusicCooldown 126');
q.run_command('execute unless entity @e[x=2705,y=179,z=2377,dy=3,type=cobblemon:npc] run npcspawnat 2705 179 2377 zinnia_generic');
q.run_command('execute unless entity @e[x=2705,y=179,z=2381,dy=3,type=cobblemon:npc] run pokespawnat 2705 179 2381 whismur level=30 no_ai=yes');

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Nice!

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: So this is the heart of the famous Space Center everyone talks about!

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Pretty impressive, huh, Aster?

pages.speaker: whismur
lines: Mur mur mur!

action: q.run_command('execute unless entity @e[x=2711,y=179,z=2379,dy=3,type=cobblemon:npc] run npcspawnat 2711 179 2379 lady_generic');

pages.speaker: lass
lines: Excuse me! Young lady! You can't just let yourself in here!

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Oh? Where's the harm in it? Don't be such a stick-in-the-mud! ♪

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: ...Right?

pages.speaker: lass
lines: Ugh...

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run gamemode adventure');

pages.speaker: steven
lines: Who...are you? You're no sightseer...

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Oh me, we do seem to keep running into one another.

pages.speaker: profcozmo
lines: Wh-who are you?! What're you doing here?!

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Me? I'm Zinnia.

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Just your regular ol' tourist, nothing more.

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Dreaming of taking a little trip into space... Heh.

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Oh, I seeeeee... So this is what has come of human technology and of hope and blood and sweat and tears and...

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Well, the list gets kinda long and boring. But it contains everything, huh?

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: I know all about it.

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: About just what kinda energy you're using to fuel this rocket thing...

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: The abominable technology humanity first thought up 3,000 years ago...

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: So you're once again planning to claim that this is best for humanity, or best for the whole darn world...

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: It's a snap of your fingers to repeat the sins of the past.

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Worse, if what I overheard is true...

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: This time, you're about to commit an error more abominable than before!

pages.speaker: steven
lines: Tell me, would you rather we sit here wringing our hands, waiting for that meteoroid to strike us?

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Ahahahaha! What's up with that?

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: You're a pretty simple guy for a former Pokémon League Champion.

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Then I guess I'll hang my hopes on what our current Champion will have to say.

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: What do you think? Do you have some better idea?

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Oooh! Really? Well, that's promising...

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: You'll have to tell me so we can set these guys straight.

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Really? Too bad. Guess I was expecting more than I should have from you.

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Hey, that's fine, though. That's pretty normal.

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Look, I'm not here to criticize the way you guys are looking at this.

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: But I want to be sure you've thought this through well and good.

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: You know, there are necessary sacrifices, and there are unnecessary sacrifices.

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: What a disappointment!

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: This is the best you could do with all your knowledge and technology?

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Instead of trying to make something outta nothing, you'd rather repeat the mistakes of the past, straight up?

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: No, you're gonna add new mistakes on top—that really takes the cake.

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: You guys need some imagination.

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Oops! But you were all in the middle of a conversation or something, right?

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Sorry about that.

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: I guess we'll just let ourselves out, then.

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: C'mon, Aster.

pages.speaker: whismur
lines: Mur mur mur!

pages.speaker: steven
lines: ... Who was that woman?

pages.speaker: steven
lines: And the way she spoke to us...

pages.speaker: steven
lines: It's almost as if she came here for some kind of confirmation...

pages.speaker: steven
lines: Ah, Professor, forgive me.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: I believe you were trying to tell us something before that woman interrupted us?

pages.speaker: profcozmo
lines: Uh... Yes... Ah, you see...

pages.speaker: profcozmo
lines: In order to complete the warp hole, we will need another Meteorite Shard, an extremely pure one...

pages.speaker: steven
lines: Then should we head to Granite Cave once again?

pages.speaker: profcozmo
lines: No... The kind of Meteorite Shard we need this time can only be found at Meteor Falls.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: Meteor Falls!

pages.speaker: steven
lines: I see... Perhaps we will learn something there...

pages.speaker: steven
lines: I will head to Meteor Falls at once. Follow as soon as you are ready.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: I feel we might discover even more than a Meteorite Shard there...
